name: kate-chat
description: KateChat - Universal Chat Interface for AI Models

scripts.install:client: npm install && cd client && npm install
scripts.install:api: npm install && cd api && npm install
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd client && npm install && cd ../api && npm install

scripts.build:client: cd client && npm run build && cd ../
scripts.build:api: cd api && npm run build && cd ../

scripts.format: cd client && npm run format && cd ../api && npm run format
